title: Picture, Framed, 19th century
description: painting on glass of elaborate interior setting with center standing figure of richly attired lady in colorful brocaded robes, offering gifts to a jester-like man with curly beard and skull cap  who is in a half-kneeling position at her feet; at either side stand female attendants also richly attired.  In carved teakwood frame with peirced lattice-fret borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Picture, Framed, 19th century.
19th century. painted glass, wood. Gift of Mrs. Revell Hoover. 1968-69-3.
